title: Lower latitude chain (Lat 44.3, Long 286.4), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Lewis, NY, 1 sec time Resolution. - Jennifer Gannon, Delores Knipp, Mike Henderson  (Computational Physics, Inc, University of Colorado, Boulder, GIC Magnetics. )

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'thg_mag_dat_time' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/themis/thg/l2/mag/dat/2021/thg_l2_mag_dat_20210201_v01.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 99.9921% of the 25158 timesteps. Cadence = 1000000000 [ns] = PT1S.
info.contact: Jennifer Gannon, Delores Knipp, Mike Henderson @ Computational Physics, Inc, University of Colorado, Boulder, GIC Magnetics.

parameters.name: thg_mag_dat
parameters.description: Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_dat
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_dat']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magd_dat
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_dat']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magz_dat
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_dat']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
